author: dibrg
content: Wello, I'm comfussed,when I find an XSS bug in only one page ,how can I make XSS-worm??? Could you give me some seggestions?? Thanks for your time.

author: pdp
content:
Hi Dibrg,

It is not straightforward. You need to find a way to persist the XSS vector. There are many way you can do that and one of it is to use public bookmarking services.
